title: Саранхэ
overview: Sarankhe (Russian: Саранхэ)  is a game for couples in love for money. In each episode, the participants - a young man and a girl - will have to, without saying a word, answer questions about each other's habits, shortcomings and interests in the same way. In total, the heroes will be asked 10 questions. Each correct answer increases the prize fund by 10,000 rubles. At the end, lovers will be invited to play a super game. 3 super questions can increase your winnings 3 times!
